outputs.output_expression:
#"c993facf-ee9a-40e5-857f-2688c58b0839-tmg-am-am"(
  tasks: pv!tasks,
  initiator: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: pv!initiator,
    replacementValue: pp!initiator
  ),
  startTime: pv!startTime,
  taskActionId: pv!taskActionId
)

called_by: AS GSS TMG Update Task Details for Initiation

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields
expression_rules.description: Updates one or more fields of a CDT, with an optional input for indices

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.
called_by: AS GSS TMG Task Action Audit

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

called_by: AS GSS TMG Task Action Audit
AS GSS TMG Update Task Details for Initiation

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
expression_rules.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned
called_by: AS GSS TMG Update Task Details for Initiation

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_TMG_UT_initiateTasks
expression_rules.description: Accepts a list of tasks and configures the fields for initiation, also updating "modifiedBy" metadata
called_by: AS GSS TMG Update Task Details for Initiation

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata
expression_rules.description: Automatically sets the "auditing" fields on a CDT, including createdDatetime/createdBy/modifiedDatetime/modifiedBy/isActive/isDeleted
